mapper.select: SELECT map_id, user_id, title, path, description, distance, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%M-%d') as regDate FROM RunningPath;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RunningPath (map_id, user_id, title, path, description, distance, reg_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{path}, #{description}, #{distance}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT map_id, user_id, title, path, description, distance, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%M-%d') as regDate FROM RunningPath ORDER BY (6371 * 2 * ASIN(SQRT( POWER(SIN((RADIANS(SUBSTRING(${location}, locate('lat', ${location})+5,locate(",",${location})-locate(":",${location})-1)) - RADIANS(SUBSTRING(path, locate('lat', path)+5,locate(",",path)-locate(":",path)-1))) / 2), 2) + COS(RADIANS(SUBSTRING(path, locate('lat', path)+5,locate(",",path)-locate(":",path)-1))) * COS(RADIANS(SUBSTRING(${location}, locate('lat', ${location})+5,locate(",",${location})-locate(":",${location})-1))) * POWER(SIN((RADIANS(SUBSTRING(${location}, locate('lng', ${location})+5,length(${location})-locate("lng",${location}))) - RADIANS(SUBSTRING(path, locate('lng', path)+5,length(path)-locate("lng",path)))) / 2), 2) ))) LIMIT 5
